name: Ultra HD 4K CCTV Security Camera
description: Professional-grade 4K Ultra HD security camera with night vision and weather-resistant housing. Perfect for outdoor surveillance with crystal-clear video quality even in low light conditions.
features: 50m night vision range with infrared LEDs
Compatible with Smart Shield mobile app

reviews.author: John D.
reviews.comment: Excellent camera! The 4K resolution makes a huge difference in identifying people and vehicles. Night vision is exceptional as well.

reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.comment: Great quality picture and easy to set up. The only downside is that the app could use some improvements.

reviews.author: Robert L.
reviews.comment: Survived a major storm and still works perfectly. Image quality is outstanding and the notifications are reliable.

name: Smart Doorbell Camera with Two-Way Audio
description: Keep an eye on your front door with this smart doorbell camera. Features two-way audio, motion detection, and HD video. Get instant alerts when visitors arrive or packages are delivered.

reviews.author: Emily R.
reviews.comment: So glad I got this doorbell camera! Already caught a package thief in the act and the video quality was good enough for police to identify them.

reviews.author: Michael P.
reviews.comment: Works great overall. The motion detection is sometimes a bit too sensitive, but better that than missing something important.

name: 8-Channel Smart NVR System with 4 Cameras
description: Complete security solution with an 8-channel NVR and four 2K cameras. Monitor your entire property with this expandable system that offers continuous recording, motion detection, and remote viewing capabilities.

specifications.Remote Access: Smart Shield app (iOS/Android) and Web Client

reviews.author: James W.
reviews.comment: Excellent system for our small business. Installation was straightforward and the image quality is superb. The AI detection significantly reduces false alerts.

reviews.author: Patricia L.
reviews.comment: Best security investment we've made for our home. The system is easy to use and knowing we can add more cameras as needed is great.

name: PTZ Dome Security Camera with 25x Optical Zoom
description: Advanced PTZ (Pan-Tilt-Zoom) dome camera with incredible 25x optical zoom capability for monitoring large areas. Remote control functionality allows you to adjust viewing angles and zoom from anywhere.

reviews.author: Thomas B.
reviews.comment: The zoom capability on this camera is impressive. We use it to monitor our parking lot and can easily read license plates from across the property.

reviews.author: Laura K.
reviews.comment: Great camera overall. The PTZ functions work smoothly and the preset patrol routes are a great feature. Took off one star because the app could be more intuitive.

name: Wireless Indoor Security Camera
description: Compact and easy-to-install wireless indoor security camera with 1080p HD video, two-way audio, and night vision. Perfect for monitoring pets, children, or elderly family members.
features: Works with Smart Shield mobile app

specifications.Storage: Cloud storage or MicroSD card (up to 128GB)

reviews.author: Jennifer L.
reviews.comment: Perfect little camera for keeping an eye on my pets while I'm at work. The two-way audio is great for calming my dog when he gets anxious.

reviews.author: David R.
reviews.comment: Good quality for the price. The night vision is better than I expected for an indoor camera.

reviews.author: Michelle T.
reviews.comment: Easy setup and great picture quality. I bought three more after trying the first one!

name: 4TB Security Hard Drive
description: High-performance 4TB hard drive specifically designed for 24/7 security system operation. Optimized for continuous recording and playback from multiple high-resolution cameras.
features: Compatible with all major NVR and DVR systems

reviews.author: Richard K.
reviews.comment: Perfect upgrade for our NVR system. Much more storage than the stock drive that came with our system.

reviews.author: Karen J.
reviews.comment: Reliable and quiet. Easy to install in our SmartShield NVR.

name: Smart Security Motion Sensor - 3 Pack
description: Set of three wireless motion sensors that integrate with your Smart Shield security system. Get instant alerts when motion is detected, with adjustable sensitivity to reduce false alarms.

reviews.author: Steven P.
reviews.comment: These sensors work perfectly with our Smart Shield system. The pet mode is great - no false alarms from our cats.

reviews.author: Nancy G.
reviews.comment: Good quality sensors. Battery life seems good so far and the sensitivity adjustment is helpful.

name: Professional CCTV Installation Service
description: Expert installation service for your Smart Shield security system. Our certified technicians will install, configure, and optimize your cameras and recording equipment for maximum coverage and performance.

specifications.Additional Fees: May apply for complex installations or extra cabling
specifications.Requirements: Functioning power outlets and internet connection

reviews.author: William T.
reviews.comment: The technician was professional, knowledgeable, and did an excellent job hiding the cables. Would definitely recommend the installation service.

reviews.author: Sandra M.
reviews.comment: Worth every penny! The installer knew exactly where to position the cameras for maximum coverage and took the time to show us how to use the app properly.

reviews.author: Kevin B.
reviews.comment: Good service overall. The installer arrived on time and completed the work professionally. The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that it took longer than expected.
